remarks.para: Except for ER operations beyond 120 minutes, one may be inoperative provided aircraft is not operated in known or forecast icing conditions.

note.para: No flight in known or forecast icing conditions.

numlitem.para: Operations in known or forecast icing conditions prohibited.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "ENGINE PROBE HEAT SYSTEM INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
